Text:
you should actually of put in what "4 disks" you actually had up on here. 
Hell I could be downloading something bogus and not what I am looking for.

Uh, he did. 
1) Lilo & Stitch
2) L&S2 - Stitch Has A Glitch
3) Stitch the Movie
4) Leroy & Stitch.

If you'd read the info clearly, you might have picked that up.
